Now, the full C code:

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <math.h>

int compare_float(const void *a, const void *b) {
    float fa = *(float*)a;
    float fb = *(float*)b;
    if (fa < fb) return -1;
    else if (fa > fb) return 1;
    else return 0;
}

int is_punctuation(char c) {
    return c == ',' || c == '.' || c == '!' || c == '?';
}

int main() {
    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    getchar(); // consume newline

    char line[1000];
    fgets(line, sizeof(line), stdin);

    // Parse the floats
    char *token = strtok(line, " ");
    float arr[1000];
    int count =0;
    while (token != NULL) {
        arr[count++] = atof(token);
        token = strtok(NULL, " ");
    }

    // Process first part
    float filtered[1000];
    int m =0;
    for (int i=0; i<count; i++) {
        float x = arr[i];
        float frac = x - (int)x;
        if (frac != 0.0) {
            filtered[m++] = frac;
        }
    }
    qsort(filtered, m, sizeof(float), compare_float);
    float arr_sum =0;
    for (int i=0; i<m; i++) {
        arr_sum += filtered[i];
    }
    int o = 2 * n - m;
    float res = 2e9;
    for (int i=0; i<=n; i++) {
        if (i + o >= n) {
            float current = fabs(i - arr_sum);
            if (current < res) {
                res = current;
            }
        }
    }

    // Format res to second_input
    char second_input[20];
    sprintf(second_input, "%.3f", res);

    // Process second part
    int num_g =0, num_p =0;
    int score =0;
    for (int i=0; i < strlen(second_input); i++) {
        char c = second_input[i];
        if (c == 'g') {
            if (num_g - num_p >0) {
                score +=1;
                num_p +=1;
            } else {
                num_g +=1;
            }
        } else if (c == 'p') {
            if (num_g - num_p >0) {
                num_p +=1;
            } else {
                score -=1;
                num_g +=1;
            }
        }
    }

    // Process third part
    char third_input[20];
    sprintf(third_input, "%d", score);

    // Process third part's logic
    char res_third[100];
    int res_len =0;
    for (int i=0; i < strlen(third_input); i++) {
        char c = third_input[i];
        if (i ==0) {
            if (c == '\0') continue;
            if (is_punctuation(c)) {
                continue;
            } else {
                res_third[res_len++] = c;
            }
        } else {
            if (is_punctuation(c)) {
                if (res_len >0 && res_third[res_len-1] == '\0') {
                    res_len--;
                }
                res_third[res_len++] = c;
                res_third[res_len++] = '\0';
            } else {
                res_third[res_len++] = c;
            }
        }
    }

    // Build final string
    char final_str[100];
    int final_len =0;
    for (int j=0; j < res_len; j++) {
        if (res_third[j] != '\0') {
            final_str[final_len++] = res_third[j];
        }
    }
    final_str[final_len] = '\0';

    printf("%s\n", final_str);

    return 0;
}
